title: How To Not Blow Through Your Savings
description:
On this week’s Loose Change episode, Berna is back with Chris Browning from Popcorn Finance to continue their conversation on saving. They get into the saving mindset and how to break through the temptations to tap into your savings as you go through life. Chris also share his own personal financial journey, and how he was able to find a path that worked for him and allowed him to meet his goals. Be sure to follow us @whenshappyhr to stay up to date with the podcast and submit your questions!
Thanks again to our presenting sponsor Public.com! Visit public.com/betches to sign up and get started today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
